name: iShares Global Timber & Forestry ETF
description: The iShares Global Timber & Forestry ETF (WOOD) is an exchange-traded fund that aims to track the investment results of an index composed of global equities in the timber and forestry sector. Launched by BlackRock, this ETF provides investors with exposure to companies involved in the ownership, management, or utilization of forests and timberland. The fund invests in a diverse range of companies, including those engaged in timberland investment, paper and forest products, and wood-based building materials. By doing so, WOOD serves as an attractive option for investors looking to capitalize on the growing demand for sustainable timber and renewable resources, particularly as environmental concerns continue to drive interest in eco-friendly investments. The ETF offers a unique way to gain access to the forestry market, which is often less correlated with traditional equity markets. Moreover, the fund emphasizes sustainability, investing in companies that adhere to responsible forestry practices. With a focus on long-term growth and income from timber and timber-related products, this ETF is ideal for investors seeking to diversify their portfolios while supporting sustainable practices in the forestry industry.

seo.meta_title: iShares Global Timber & Forestry ETF (WOOD) | Sustainable Timber Investments
seo.meta_description: Invest in the iShares Global Timber & Forestry ETF (WOOD) to gain exposure to sustainable timber and forestry companies worldwide.

faq.question: What is the iShares Global Timber & Forestry ETF?
faq.answer: The iShares Global Timber & Forestry ETF (WOOD) is an exchange-traded fund that provides exposure to global equities in the timber and forestry sector.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of iShares?
faq.answer: Jennifer Grancio is the CEO of iShares.

faq.question: Where is iShares headquartered?
faq.answer: iShares is headquartered in New York, New York, USA.

faq.question: What are the main holdings of WOOD?
faq.answer: WOOD primarily holds companies involved in timberland, paper products, and wood-based building materials.

faq.question: When was the iShares Global Timber & Forestry ETF founded?
faq.answer: The iShares Global Timber & Forestry ETF was founded in 2006.
